input: It took Aaron a long time to finish his work compared to Leslie because _ is very hardworking.
Monica was a big fan of art but Rachel was a sports fan. _ bought a ticket to the museum.
Victoria was worried about Angela's stuffy nose, because _ began to observe constant sniffling and sneezing.
Eric had to make sure to stay close to bathrooms but not Kevin because _  did not have Giardiasis.
Megan loves grilling steaks but Patricia is a vegetarian. _ gobbles up all the steak.
After Jessica found the injured squirrel she decided to put it in a cage instead of a shoe box, because the _ was smaller.
Victoria gave Lindsey directions to the store even though _ already knew how to get to the one they were going to.
I took my cat to a vet the cat was given drugs for a cold but the _ was too weak.
